message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $110. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $95 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $100 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
